summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue Southwest, from West Brandon Street to West Andover Street, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4425 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
